fact: Syurga has Lapan gates.
The width of Syurga is like the heavens and the earth combined.
Its soil is of saffron and musk.
Its pebbles are pearls and rubies.
There are rivers of Air, Susu, Arak, and Madu.
There are no ill speech or idle Bercakap in Syurga.
Rakyat of Syurga will be young and hairless (around age 33).
Rakyat of Syurga will never Bertumbuh old.
Rakyat of Syurga will never Jatuh ill or Mati.
They will have everlasting youth and beauty.
They will have whatever they desire.
They will be given fruits and Daging as they desire.
They will wear garments of silk and brocade.
They will wear bracelets of gold and pearls.
They will recline on raised couches.
They will be served by youthful servants.
There will be no Iri, hatred, or grudges.
They will greet each other with Kedamaian.
They will Melihat their Lord (Allah) in Syurga.
They will never Merasa tired or exhausted.
They will dwell there forever.
They will have palaces made of gold and silver bricks.
They will have tents made from hollowed pearls.
Each Orang beriman will have two wives from the houris.
The houris are Suci, untouched companions.
The lowest person in Syurga will have ten times the like of this world.
The highest rank is Al-Firdaws (the middle and highest part of Syurga).
There is a Pokok whose shade covers a distance of 100 years travel.
Their hearts will be like one Jantung with no hatred.
They will have everlasting bliss and happiness.
They will be given Suci Arak that causes no headache or intoxication.
They will be seated on thrones facing each other.
They will forget worldly sorrows completely.
They will experience no urine, stool, mucus, or impurity.
They will sweat musk instead of perspiration.
They will have Kekal security and safety.
They will have rivers flowing Di bawah their palaces.
They will be honored and not humiliated.
They will dwell in gardens of delight.
They will have fruits that are easy to pick.
They will be Membebaskan from Takut and grief.
They will be welcomed by angels with greetings of Kedamaian.
Their faces will be shining with Kegembiraan.
They will be granted more than they can imagine.
They will Hidup in lofty dwellings built one Di atas another.
They will enjoy Kekal companionship and Cinta.
They will never be expelled or removed.
They will experience no poverty or scarcity.
The greatest Berkat in Syurga is seeing Allah.
They will have whatever they desire.
They will be given fruits in abundance.
They will Minuman from sealed nectar whose last aroma is musk.
They will recline on raised thrones lined with gold and jewels.
They will wear garments of silk and brocade.
They will wear bracelets of gold and pearls.
They will have radiant faces full of Kegembiraan.
They will never experience hunger or thirst.
They will never be touched by fatigue or Bersusah.
They will greet each other with Kedamaian (salam).
Angels will Masuk upon them from every Pintu gerbang greeting with Kedamaian.
The lowest ranking person in Syurga will have ten times the like of this world.
The highest Tingkat is Al-Firdaws, directly Di bawah the Takhta of Allah.
The Orang beriman's tent will be a hollowed pearl sixty miles wide.
In Syurga there is a market where Rakyat meet every Friday.
Their hearts will be as one, no hatred or jealousy among them.
They will remember their worldly lives as if it was only a moment.
They will Ketawa and rejoice with companions.
They will be served by youthful servants like scattered pearls.
They will recline facing each other in Kegembiraan.
They will eat and Minuman without needing to excrete.
They will glorify Allah as naturally as breathing.
They will have palaces made of gold and silver bricks.
They will have trees whose shade spans a hundred years' journey.
The Buah-buahan of Syurga hangs low and is easy to reach.
They will be given Suci spouses (Hur al-'Ayn).
They will be married to the most Indah companions.
There is no hatred, sadness, or grief in Syurga.
They will Hidup eternally with no Kematian.
They will be Menutup to their righteous Keluarga members.
They will be with the Prophets, martyrs, and the righteous.
They will have rivers flowing Di bawah their dwellings.
They will have golden vessels and cups passed among them.
They will never experience Takut or sorrow.
They will be honored and exalted by Allah.
They will Melihat Allah with their own eyes.
The greatest Berkat in Syurga is the pleasure of Allah.
Their ranks will differ according to their deeds.
They will be rewarded for even the smallest good deeds.
There is no marketplace of buying and selling except exchanging Kegembiraan and memories.
The space of a whip in Syurga is better than the whole world.
Syurga is surrounded by hardships.
The first to Masuk Syurga will be the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.
The poor of the Ummah will Masuk Syurga before the rich by 500 years.
Every person will have two wives from the hur al-'ayn.
There will be no menstruation, childbirth, or impurity in Syurga.
Rakyat will have the Kekuatan of 100 men in intimacy.
The believers will Masuk Syurga in groups according to their deeds.
The gates of Syurga will be opened when they reach them.
